title: Is Mahomes-Allen the New Brady-Manning?
description:
Lindsay Jones gets Kevin Clark on the horn to share some of the offensive coaching and player updates he witnessed at the Chiefs and Bills' respective training camps. First, they examine Kansas City's revamped receiving corps and how they'll affect Patrick Mahomes's QB play (3:16). Then, they discuss Buffalo's new OC, Ken Dorsey, and speculate if he'll be able to elevate Josh Allen's game to the next level this season (14:56).
Hosts: Lindsay Jones and Kevin Clark
Producers: Arjuna Ramgopal and Conor Nevins
Production Assistance: Chris Sutton
